text: This is the all-time Philippine Basketball Association team standings, which includes all of the teams that participated. Standings are accurate as of the semifinal round of the 2019 PBA Governors' Cup. Guest teams are listed below, may have participated at least one conference, but all teams here have played at least one conference in the PBA. Key: *Unshaded and boldfaced: Active team *Yellow: Disbanded team *Purple: Guest team, currently not in league. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:right;" |- ! Team !! Played !! Wins !!
